com.epoch.genericQTypes

Class ChooseExplain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.genericQTypes.ChooseExplain

  • public class ChooseExplain
extends Object
    Holds a response to a choose-and-explain question.

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChooseExplain

        public ChooseExplain(String respStr)
              throws ParameterException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        respStr - String containing the choice and text responses separated by the separator.
        Throws:
        ParameterException - if response is null or there is no separator or there is no choice string
        NumberFormatException - if numbers can't be parsed

      • ChooseExplain

        public ChooseExplain(String respStr,
                     int numOptions)
              throws ParameterException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        respStr - String containing the choice and text responses separated by the separator.
        numOptions - the number of options in the question
        Throws:
        ParameterException - if response is null or there is no separator or there is no choice string

        Gets the position of the separator between the choice and text parts of the response.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the position of the separator
        Throws:

      • getUnchosenString

        public static String getUnchosenString(String resp)
                                throws ParameterException
        Strips the student's choices from the response.
        Parameters:
        resp - the response
        Returns:
        the response with all choices stripped
        Throws:
        ParameterException - if response can't be parsed

      • getInitialString

        public static String getInitialString(int numOpts,
                                      boolean scramble,
                                      boolean exceptLast)
        Builds an initialized string.
        Parameters:
        numOpts - number of options
        scramble - whether to scramble the options
        exceptLast - if scrambling, whether to leave the last option last
        Returns:
        a string in the format 1:2:3:...[tab], maybe with options scrambled
